An unassuming car that has an engine modified to hustle other racers that underestimate it
A project racecar still under construction

It is an oxidizer & it intensifies & accelerates combustion
The twin turbos on a Porche 933 and polished engine dominate the view flanked by bright red air strakes with black louvers.
People look on from the dragstrip bleachers as the rear slicks wrinkle under the torque of the green rat rod 1930\'s sedan\'s launch.
A shiny red 1967 Firebird 400 sitting on a car show lawn next to a baby blue car.
A dirty rusty looking engine bay reveals a beautiful shiny modified engine it is hiding
A shiny waxed lime and black 1973 340 Cuda sitting in it\'s garage
A purple 1969 Camaro does a wheelstand as it launches against a black and yellow railcar.
A Charcoal GTR33 Skyline with wide tires and black wheels sits at the ready
A Blue 2 pound NOS bottle sits attached to the side of a jade green motorcycle just below the black leather seat.
